title: Trading skins
body: I just wanted to know if Riot Games would ever create a feature in League of Legends which allows the trading of skins, champions or wards between two players who are friends. I was also thinking that if this feature would become present to the League of Legends community, that maybe it could also include the trading of Hextech skin, champion and ward shards as well.

replies.body: Botting would go through the roof
It would not be a profitable move long term. Short term if they charged a small amount for each trade they'd make a mint.
{{champion:266}} Yes please riot add trade skins :D
